overview:
## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureResolvedPhotoSettings/expectedPhotoCount] property of this capture result’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhoto/resolvedSettings] object indicates the total number of images that will be returned for a given capture request. When your delegate’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoCaptureDelegate/photoOutput(_:didFinishProcessingPhoto:error:)] method receives a photo whose [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhoto/photoCount] value  matches the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureResolvedPhotoSettings/expectedPhotoCount] value, you know you’ve received the last one for the given capture request.

# photoCount

**Instance Property**

The 1-based index of this photo capture relative to other results from the same capture request.

## Declaration

```swift
var photoCount: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

The [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureResolvedPhotoSettings/expectedPhotoCount] property of this capture result’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhoto/resolvedSettings] object indicates the total number of images that will be returned for a given capture request. When your delegate’s [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhotoCaptureDelegate/photoOutput(_:didFinishProcessingPhoto:error:)] method receives a photo whose [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCapturePhoto/photoCount] value  matches the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureResolvedPhotoSettings/expectedPhotoCount] value, you know you’ve received the last one for the given capture request.

## Resolving photo capture requests

- **resolvedSettings**: The settings object that was used to request this photo capture.
- **timestamp**: The time at which the image was captured.
